idea:
XeonVFX is one of the largest outsourcing service provider companies in India, established in Mumbai.
We have the best artists, who keep armed with the latest tools and technology available to produce high-quality work for Feature films, commercials, and TV shows.
We're one of the largest outsourcing service provider companies in India, established in Mumbai. We have the best artists, who keep armed with the latest tools and technology available to produce high-quality work for Feature films, commercials, and TV shows.
Our Scope of Work:
XeonVFX undertakes all kinds of VFX projects.
XeonVFX currently has 15 efficient, dedicated and highly experienced artists working on various projects. We have experience of working successfully and completing projects on deadline as well. We are always ahead to match our ETA and delivery dates.
We do the following services:
VFX ROTOSCOPE
STEREO ROTOSCOPE
CROMA KEYING
CLEANUP & TRACKING
MATCH MOVING
COMPOSITING
POST PRODUCTION & DIGITAL INTERMEDIATE (DI)
We also take test shots to give you a clear view of our quality.
Company strategy:
The purpose of providing quality services that exceeds the expectations of our esteemed clients. Vision to be a leader and set up a benchmark in the VFX Industry by providing enhanced and high-quality services to our esteemed clients.
Mission statement: To build a healthy, cordial and highly professional long-term relationships with our customers and clients and provide exceptional customer services by pursuing business through innovation and advanced technology.
Core values: We believe in treating our customers with respect and faith. We grow through creativity, invention, and innovation. We integrate honesty, integrity, and business ethics into all aspects of our business functioning.
Goals: Expansion in the field of Stereoscopy and VFX roto and develop a strong base of key clients. To build a good reputation in the field of stereoscopy and VFX roto and become a key player in the industry. Look forward building a long-term relationship.
We would be honoured to get associated with you for any kind of outsourced work to us at present or in future.
Looking forward to hear a positive revert from you.
Below is our website link and Some of our work for your perusal.

idea:
neckfit.in/faq

We have innovated and market world's first ergonomically compatible, matching to neck curve and broadness of shoulders of each user, customised, readily available, pillows under the brand name Neckfit.


Neckfit helps overcome cervical Spondylosis, back pain, shoulder pain, upper arm pain and enables correct posture of spine while sleeping.


Neckfit eliminates the need to adjust pillow for height everytime one shifts from back to side sleeping position. Good to preempt spine related medical issues.

idea: We are solving the problem of high ineffectiveness of current employee training methods resulting in low skill development and high accidents. We are a B2B platform that provides proprietary Virtual Reality (VR) training modules on subscription for every employer to train their workforce more efficiently. Our solution is cost effective (subscription) and time-effective (on-demand) that drives easy adaptation of VR. Our vision is to bring about a behavioural change on how training is perceived.

idea:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tkSanYm7rjA

Docet is a network of participants, each with their own unique set of contributions in the form of proofs of knowledge packaged together in categories of their choice. Value for individuals is generated through a rating consensus among eligible participants thereby allowing each participant to convert their contributions into personal assets. These assets provide valuable insights to the overall knowledge base of the individual. Creation of these proofs or showcases of skill, is not limited by format and individuals can choose freely how best to portray their learnings. With the proliferation of social networks online, the ability to measure socio-economic consensus for various applications has led to great interest in the field of dynamic average consensus over a network. Research from the fields economics, game development, and psychology have been incorporated in the creation of this proposed network.


Docet’s network has a hierarchal structure which limits participant’s ability to affect change within the network based on their standings in it, vis a vis, a higher-level participant can effect greater change to the standings of others than a lower level participant. 

The hierarchal network as described has weights for each node, the value of which decreases from the topmost level group downwards. For any given node in a group, consensus among each group above it in the network is calculated asynchronously, based on which the next state of the node is determined. The eligibility of affecting the state of the given node is determined by qualifying states possessed by the affecting nodes. Once eligible, state changes suggested for the given node is logged and processed sequentially based on log time at set intervals to calculate consensus of the affecting nodes and the state of the affected node is updated. The following are examples of a few conditions included in the determination of state of the affecting node (noted below as raters):


♣ if a participant’s level is changed because of a new pok upload, previous ratings given at that level by said users does not change unless the level change is less than -4. If less than -4, flagged for manual verification to check validity of initial rating given to others. Removal of rating will result in an adjustment for all who have received a rating.

♣ if level of the rater changes because of new consensus for him through an increase in the no. of his peers and superiors, then the ratings given by him to everyone else is also adjusted. 

♣ It will also affect the bonus perks (explained in detail under Internal Economy) that he has received and can be increased/decreased up to a certain time. Bonuses aren’t convertible for a period of 1 week. 

♣ Bonus perks received will be a function of the rate of change of level score by an individual. Spent rating perk is immediately returned in case of accuracy but bonuses are distributed at each new level through upload.


The reason why Docet is interesting is that it replicates the need for a higher authority to verify/validate a participant’s learning while simultaneously replacing the dependency on a singular authority for it. By doing so, Docet successfully democratizes the generation of value for individual learning and frees them from any restriction on how they acquire their skills. Human ability is the single most valuable commodity in the world. Today, the internet is used as a tool for organisations to identify efficient ways to target individual spending capacity through advertisements instead of evaluating individual knowledge as a commodity in and of itself. The conversion of individual proofs of knowledge as a consolidated validated asset of all the knowledge and skills one possesses can be used as a personal brand allowing participants to position themselves uniquely for qualifying jobs.
